week2

Class WordsInFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • week2.WordsInFiles

  • public class WordsInFiles
extends java.lang.Object
    Program to determine which words occur in the greatest number of files, and for each word, which files they occur in.
    Version:
    2015-11-24
    Author:
    Pawel Daniluk

    • Method Detail

      • buildWordFileMap

        public void buildWordFileMap()
        This method first clears the map, and then uses a DirectoryResource to select a group of files. For each file, it puts all of its words into the map by calling the method addWordsFromFile.

      • maxNumber

        public int maxNumber()
        This method returns the maximum number of files any word appears in, considering all words from a group of files.
        Returns:
        maximum number of files any word appears in

      • wordsInNumFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> wordsInNumFiles(int number)
        This method returns an ArrayList of words that appear in exactly number files.
        Parameters:
        number - number of files in which word appears
        Returns:
        ArrayList of words that appear in number of files

      • printFilesIn

        public void printFilesIn(java.lang.String word)
        his method prints the names of the files this word appears in, one filename per line.
        Parameters:
        word - word to be found across the files
